title: We should completely revert Galileo
body: The old Galileo was a champion that was more fun to play as a whole in comparison to the current iteration which is either really good in the current meta or so bad that it's almost reportable. I know that most people will say that old Galileo was bad and yes in some patches he was but when it comes down to it if they reworked just the hit boxes and worked on dmg scaling he really wasn't that bad. So please rework Galileo.... thanks for listening to my TED talk.
